C

calculatePath(ArrayList<City>, double, int, boolean, SelectionType) - Method in class data.GA
Takes an array of cities to be visited and generates a solution to the travelling salesman problem.
CanvasPanel - Class in gui.panel
Shows the map of cities.
CanvasPanel(StatusPanel) - Constructor for class gui.panel.CanvasPanel
Creates a new panel for the canvas allowing users to add points by clicking, and to view current points and solution paths.
City - Class in data
A node on the travelling salesman path.
City(int, int) - Constructor for class data.City
Constructs a new city with location x and y.
clearAll() - Static method in class data.SolutionManager
Clears the current path solution
compareTo(Object) - Method in class data.Path
 
containsCity(City) - Method in class data.Path
Returns a flag indicating whether a given city exists in the current path.
createPathShuffled() - Method in class data.Path
Generates a new path from the current best path, and shuffles it.
